00060 namespace ST
00061 {
00062     void submit_login(AG_Event *event)
00063     {
00064         std::string username;
00065             std::string password;
00066 
00067             AG_Textbox *one = static_cast<AG_Textbox*>(AG_PTR(1));
00068             AG_Textbox *two = static_cast<AG_Textbox*>(AG_PTR(2));
00069                 AG_Checkbox *three = static_cast<AG_Checkbox*>(AG_PTR(3));
00070                 XMLFile *file = static_cast<XMLFile*>(AG_PTR(4));
00071 
00072             if (one && two)
00073             {
00074                 username = AG_TextboxDupString(one);
00075                 password = AG_TextboxDupString(two);
00076             }
00077 
00078         if (!username.empty() && !password.empty())
00079         {
00080             player->setName(username);
00081             Packet *packet = new Packet(PAMSG_LOGIN);
00082             packet->setString(username);
00083             packet->setString(password);
00084             networkManager->sendPacket(packet);
00085 
00086                         if (three)
00087                         {
00088                                 file->changeInt("login", "save", three->state);
00089                                 if (three->state != 0)
00090                                 {
00091                                         file->changeString("login", "username", username);
00092                                 }
00093                         }
00094 
00095             interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("");
00096             interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(false);
00097         }
00098         else
00099         {
00100             interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("Invalid username or password entered.");
00101             interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(true);
00102         }
00103     }
00104 
00105     void submit_register(AG_Event *event)
00106     {
00107         std::string username;
00108             std::string password;
00109 
00110             AG_Textbox *one = static_cast<AG_Textbox*>(AG_PTR(1));
00111             AG_Textbox *two = static_cast<AG_Textbox*>(AG_PTR(2));
00112 
00113             if (one && two)
00114             {
00115                 username = AG_TextboxDupString(one);
00116                 password = AG_TextboxDupString(two);
00117             }
00118 
00119         if (!username.empty() && !password.empty())
00120         {
00121             player->setName(username);
00122             Packet *packet = new Packet(PAMSG_REGISTER);
00123             packet->setString(username);
00124             packet->setString(password);
00125             networkManager->sendPacket(packet);
00126 
00127             interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("");
00128             interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(false);
00129         }
00130         else
00131         {
00132             interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("Invalid username or password entered.");
00133             interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(true);
00134         }
00135     }
00136 
00137     void switch_login_window(AG_Event *event)
00138     {
00139         AG_Window *one = static_cast<AG_Window*>(AG_PTR(1));
00140         if (one)
00141             AG_WindowHide(one);
00142 
00143         AG_Window *two = static_cast<AG_Window*>(AG_PTR(2));
00144         if (two)
00145             AG_WindowShow(two);
00146     }

00148         LoginState::LoginState()
00149         {
00150         file = 0;
00151         }

00153         void LoginState::enter()
00154         {
00155                 int screenWidth = graphicsEngine->getScreenWidth();
00156                 int screenHeight = graphicsEngine->getScreenHeight();
00157                 mHalfScreenWidth = screenWidth / 2;
00158                 mHalfScreenHeight = screenHeight / 2;
00159 
00160                 file = new XMLFile();
00161                 file->load("townslife.cfg");
00162 
00163                 AG_Window *win = AG_WindowNew(AG_WINDOW_PLAIN|AG_WINDOW_DENYFOCUS);
00164                 AG_WindowShow(win);
00165                 AG_WindowMaximize(win);
00166 
00167                 interfaceManager->addWindow(win);
00168 
00169                 mLoginWindow = AG_WindowNewNamed(AG_WINDOW_NOBUTTONS, "LoginWindow");
00170                 mRegisterWindow = AG_WindowNewNamed(AG_WINDOW_NOBUTTONS, "Register");
00171 
00172                 createLoginWidgets();
00173                 createRegisterWidgets();
00174         }
00175 
00176         void LoginState::exit()
00177         {
00178                 interfaceManager->removeAllWindows();
00179                 delete file;
00180         }
00181 
00182         bool LoginState::update()
00183         {
00184 
00185                 // Check for input, if escape pressed, exit
00186                 if (inputManager->getKey(SDLK_ESCAPE))
00187                 {
00188                         networkManager->disconnect();
00189                         return false;
00190                 }
00191 
00192                 SDL_Delay(0);
00193 
00194                 return true;
00195         }
00196 
00197         void LoginState::createLoginWidgets()
00198         {
00199                 // read from config file whether username was saved from last time
00200                 file->setElement("login");
00201                 int state = file->readInt("login", "save");
00202                 std::string savedUser;
00203                 if (state == 1)
00204                 {
00205                         savedUser = file->readString("login", "username");
00206                 }
00207 
00208                 // create the login window's widgets
00209                 AG_WindowSetCaption(mLoginWindow, "Login");
00210                 AG_WindowSetSpacing(mLoginWindow, 12);
00211                 AG_WindowSetGeometry(mLoginWindow, mHalfScreenWidth - 125, mHalfScreenHeight - 75, 225, 152);
00212 
00213                 AG_Textbox *username = AG_TextboxNew(mLoginWindow, 0, "Username: ");
00214                 if (!savedUser.empty())
00215                 {
00216                         AG_TextboxSetString(username, savedUser.c_str());
00217                 }
00218                 AG_Textbox *password = AG_TextboxNew(mLoginWindow, AG_TEXTBOX_PASSWORD, "Password: ");
00219                 AG_Checkbox *save = AG_CheckboxNew(mLoginWindow, 0, "Save username for next time");
00220                 if (state == 1)
00221                 {
00222                         AG_CheckboxToggle(save);
00223                 }
00224                 AG_SetEvent(password, "textbox-return", submit_login, "%p%p%p%p", username, password, save, file);
00225 
00226                 AG_HBox *box = AG_HBoxNew(mLoginWindow, 0);
00227                 AG_Button *button = AG_ButtonNewFn(box, 0, "Submit", submit_login, "%p%p%p%p",
00228                                                                                    username, password, save, file);
00229                 AG_ButtonJustify(button, AG_TEXT_CENTER);
00230                 AG_Button *register_button = AG_ButtonNewFn(box, 0, "Register",
00231                                                     switch_login_window, "%p%p",
00232                                                                                                         mLoginWindow, mRegisterWindow);
00233                 AG_ButtonJustify(register_button, AG_TEXT_CENTER);
00234 
00235                 AG_WindowShow(mLoginWindow);
00236                 interfaceManager->addWindow(mLoginWindow);
00237         }
00238 
00239         void LoginState::createRegisterWidgets()
00240         {
00241                 // create registration widgets
00242                 AG_WindowSetCaption(mRegisterWindow, "Registration");
00243                 AG_WindowSetSpacing(mRegisterWindow, 12);
00244                 AG_WindowSetGeometry(mRegisterWindow, mHalfScreenWidth - 125, mHalfScreenHeight - 45, 225, 135);
00245 
00246                 AG_Textbox *reg_user = AG_TextboxNew(mRegisterWindow, 0, "Username: ");
00247                 AG_Textbox *reg_pass = AG_TextboxNew(mRegisterWindow, AG_TEXTBOX_PASSWORD, "Password: ");
00248                 AG_SetEvent(reg_pass, "textbox-return", submit_register, "%p%p", reg_user, reg_pass);
00249 
00250                 AG_HBox *reg_box = AG_HBoxNew(mRegisterWindow, 0);
00251                 AG_Button *reg_button = AG_ButtonNewFn(reg_box, 0, "Submit", submit_register, "%p%p",
00252                                                                                            reg_user, reg_pass);
00253                 AG_ButtonJustify(reg_button, AG_TEXT_CENTER);
00254                 AG_Button *back_button = AG_ButtonNewFn(reg_box, 0, "Back",
00255                                                 switch_login_window, "%p%p", mRegisterWindow, mLoginWindow);
00256         AG_ButtonJustify(back_button, AG_TEXT_CENTER);
00257 
00258                 interfaceManager->addWindow(mRegisterWindow);
00259         }
